TBH, probably not worth it, unless you're going to use it in the exact same scenario every time.You're looking at something like this: [color=#66FF00]Assign Root[/color] userprofiles.x.displays.y.z.1.3 /readout=natural (or decimal or percent or whatever)-  x is the name/number of your user profile-  y is the display which the sheet is on-  z is the line number of that sheet in the display directory

posts.post_text: February 26, 2016 at 1:56 AM#4Encoder Readout is based on the readout of the sheet with the most recent focus. Check the Window Options (yellow ball) for your sheets, and make sure the "Readout" button is enabled to show up in your Toolbar.
